statements: DELETE FROM EnergyConsumptionData WHERE sensor_id = 101 AND timestamp > '2022-01-01 00:00:00';
DELETE FROM EnergyConsumptionData WHERE energy_reading < 100 OR sensor_id IN (201, 202);
DELETE FROM SensorDetails WHERE location = 'Room A';
DELETE FROM EnergyConsumptionData WHERE timestamp < '2022-01-01' AND energy_reading > 1000;
DELETE FROM SensorLocation WHERE city = 'New York';
DELETE FROM EnergyConsumptionData WHERE sensor_id = 100 AND timestamp < '2022-01-01'
DELETE FROM SensorLocation WHERE country = 'USA' AND city = 'New York'
DELETE FROM SensorLocation WHERE location_name = 'Main Office';
DELETE FROM SensorData WHERE sensor_id = 100 AND timestamp BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
